title: Ticket #5025: condor_history should permit multiple jobid's and constraints
description:
currently condor_history allows only one jobid/constraint. after the first jobid/constraint condor_history will produce an error message.

It should be fixed so that, like condor_q multiple jobid's and constraints can be provided and the query will be the intersection of constraints and the provided jobid's.
